_comment: Manual address mappings for RED4ext macOS hooks. Generated 2025-01.

addresses.name: AssertionFailed
addresses.evidence: References format string '%s(%d) : Assertion failed: %s' at 0x106C374C3

addresses.name: CGameApplication_AddState
addresses.evidence: Near CGameEngine reference, handles game application state transitions

addresses.name: GsmState_SessionActive_ReportErrorCode
addresses.evidence: Loads error code from [X0, #0x88], near 'gsmStateError' string references

addresses.name: ScriptValidator_Validate
addresses.evidence: In script region (0x103D9...), has 'set bool to true at offset 8' pattern (fillErrors)

addresses.name: GameInstance_CollectSaveableSystems
addresses.evidence: Has vtable[0x130] access with loop pattern for system iteration

addresses.name: Global_ExecuteProcess
addresses.evidence: Calls _popen stub (0x104a3e5f0), but may be GPU profiler not scc execution
